parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Employ the following techniques to hide or conceal {{ sc-30.5_prm_1 }}: {{ sc-30.5_prm_2 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: By hiding, disguising, or concealing critical system components, organizations may be able to decrease the probability that adversaries target and successfully compromise those assets. Potential means to hide, disguise, or conceal system components include the configuration of routers or the use of encryption or virtualization techniques.
